description: Freeride takes you beyond boundaries – the ones resorts set and the ones you set for yourself. Progressive in its design and performance, the Sabre’s made for finding new lines. Durable and breathable, the N80p-X 3L GORE-TEX fabric shuts out storms. Helmet-compatible, the StormHood™ adjusts to maximize peripheral vision, and a RECCO™ reflector can help in search situations. Freedom to move is built in with articulated patterning, a fit that removes restriction, and a full side zip for easy on and off.
name: Arcteryx Sabre Anorak - Mens
